title: Strengthening Practical Software Development Competencies: Flipped Learning and Project-Based Learning Modules for Social Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design thinking and digital tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts by mastering pre-learning content provided in a flipped learning environment at over 80% proficiency
Learners can apply design thinking processes to solve social issues through project-based learning modules
Learners can analyze real-world cases and create creative solutions using digital tools through collaborative learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
